actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a total water management study, Solano County, California.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a total water management study concerning Solano County, California and to develop from this study a comprehensive plan of water resources management for the County.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a total water management study, Solano County, California.
